short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides YouTube's end cards to improve your video-watching experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HideMe - Hides YouTube end cards so you won't miss the climax of the music video or movie clip.

Don't you hate it when YouTube shows those annoying end cards at the end of every music video or movie clip? HideMe automatically removes all end cards from YouTube, allowing you to enjoy your favorite scenes without interruptions."
